title: Grandma's Tuna Casserole with Potato Chips and No Noodles

Ingredients.1: 2 (13.5 ounce) bags large, ridged potato chips (such as Ruffles®)

Ingredients.3: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.4: 2 (5 ounce) cans water-packed tuna, drained and flaked

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Crush potato chips into a large bowl. Add green beans, condensed soup, and tuna and mix until well combined. Pack into a 10x14-inch casserole dish.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until the top is crispy, about 30 minutes.
